name: wce-campus-assistant-mcp-server
description: MCP Server providing agentic tools for WCE Campus Assistant

tools.name: read_timetable_file
tools.description: Reads the class timetable for a specific day or date. Returns the schedule with classes for each hour/period.

date.description: Specific date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional, overrides day)

tools.name: notify_upcoming_exams
tools.description: Scans exam timetable and documents to find exams coming within the specified number of days. Returns subjects, dates, and times.

days_ahead.description: Number of days ahead to check for exams

tools.name: generate_study_plan
tools.description: Generates a day-wise study plan based on the list of subjects, exam date, and available study hours per day.

tools.name: browse_local_files
tools.description: Browses local files and directories to list available documents, notices, and PDFs.

path.description: Path to browse (relative to data directory or absolute)
